data.name: Azorius Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{U} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: The maze-like design embodies the core of Azorius law—strict structure designed to test wills and stall change.

data.name: Bloodletter Quill
data.oracle_text:
{2}, {T}, Put a blood counter on Bloodletter Quill: Draw a card, then you lose 1 life for each blood counter on Bloodletter Quill.
{U}{B}: Remove a blood counter from Bloodletter Quill.

data.name: Boros Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text:
"Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."
—Agrus Kos

data.name: Bottled Cloister
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, exile all cards from your hand face down.
At the beginning of your upkeep, return all cards you own exiled with Bottled Cloister to your hand, then draw a card.

data.name: Bronze Bombshell
data.oracle_text: When a player other than Bronze Bombshell's owner controls it, that player sacrifices it. If the player does, Bronze Bombshell deals 7 damage to him or her.
data.flavor_text:
"Ooh, shiny! Let's pull off the chain and take her with us."
—Ukl, Gruul raider, last words

data.name: Cloudstone Curio
data.oracle_text: Whenever a nonartifact permanent enters the battlefield under your control, you may return another permanent you control that shares a permanent type with it to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: It wants to remain a mystery, banishing the curious in favor of less inquisitive company.

data.name: Crown of Convergence
data.oracle_text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
As long as the top card of your library is a creature card, creatures you control that share a color with that card get +1/+1.
{G}{W}: Put the top card of your library on the bottom of your library.

data.name: Cyclopean Snare
data.oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature, then return Cyclopean Snare to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: The spoiled, gluttonous halls of the Orzhov teem with gaudy, needless wealth. Even their security measures are made for beauty first, efficiency second.

data.name: Dimir Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.

data.name: Evolution Vat
data.oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Tap target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it. Until end of turn, that creature gains "{2}{G}{U}: Double the number of +1/+1 counters on this creature."
data.flavor_text: The vats are self-contained worlds, bubbling and churning with unnatural speed, boiling down eons of change into moments.

data.name: Glass Golem
data.flavor_text: Izzet artificers have learned to steer their beautiful constructs clear of Boros warhammers—and the opera house.

data.name: Golgari Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.

data.name: Grifter's Blade
data.oracle_text:
Flash
As Grifter's Blade enters the battlefield, choose a creature you control it could be attached to. If you do, it enters the battlefield attached to that creature.
Equipped creature gets +1/+1.
Equip {1}

data.name: Gruul Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{G} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.

data.name: Gruul War Plow
data.oracle_text:
Creatures you control have trample.
{1}{R}{G}: Gruul War Plow becomes a 4/4 Juggernaut artifact creature until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"Steering apparatus?! What for? Rip it out, sharpen it, and lash it to the front!"
—Ktank, Gruul plowmaster

data.name: Izzet Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.

data.name: Junktroller
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
{T}: Put target card from a graveyard on the bottom of its owner's library.
data.flavor_text: One man's trash is another man's troller.

data.name: Leashling
data.oracle_text: Put a card from your hand on top of your library: Return Leashling to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Constructed of leather and irony.

data.name: Magewright's Stone
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Untap target creature that has an activated ability with {T} in its cost.
data.flavor_text: The stones hark back to an age before civilization, when the living earth blessed all who trod its untamed wilds.

data.name: Mizzium Transreliquat
data.oracle_text:
{3}: Mizzium Transreliquat becomes a copy of target artifact until end of turn.
{1}{U}{R}: Mizzium Transreliquat becomes a copy of target artifact and gains this ability.
data.flavor_text:
"What is it? Um . . . what do you want it to be?"
—Juzba, Izzet tinker

data.name: Moratorium Stone
data.oracle_text:
{2}, {T}: Exile target card from a graveyard.
{2}{W}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice Moratorium Stone: Exile target nonland card from a graveyard, all other cards from graveyards with the same name as that card, and all permanents with that name.

data.name: Muse Vessel
data.oracle_text:
{3}, {T}: Target player exiles a card from his or her hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.
{1}: Choose a card exiled with Muse Vessel. You may play that card this turn.

data.name: Nullstone Gargoyle
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever the first noncreature spell of a turn is cast, counter that spell.
data.flavor_text: Nullstone absorbs and dampens most forms of magical energy, as well as light, sound, and heat.

data.name: Orzhov Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.

data.name: Pariah's Shield
data.oracle_text:
All damage that would be dealt to you is dealt to equipped creature instead.
Equip {3}
data.flavor_text: To bear the shield of the pariah is the highest honor a Boros can receive—and the last.

data.name: Peregrine Mask
data.oracle_text:
Equipped creature has defender, flying, and first strike.
Equip {2}
data.flavor_text: The mask confers both the prowess of a falcon and its loyalty.

data.name: Plague Boiler
data.oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a plague counter on Plague Boiler.
{1}{B}{G}: Put a plague counter on Plague Boiler or remove a plague counter from it.
When Plague Boiler has three or more plague counters on it, sacrifice it. If you do, destroy all nonland permanents.

data.name: Rakdos Riteknife
Rakdos Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.

data.name: Selesnya Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.

data.name: Simic Signet
data.oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.

data.name: Skullmead Cauldron
data.oracle_text:
{T}: You gain 1 life.
{T}, Discard a card: You gain 3 life.
data.flavor_text: Once tasted, the flavor of skullmead lingers in the throat, a secret brand of guilt for those who partake in forbidden pleasures.

data.name: Spectral Searchlight
data.oracle_text: {T}: Choose a player. That player adds one mana of any color he or she chooses to his or her mana pool.
data.flavor_text: The first searchlights were given as gifts, symbols of cooperation, to the emissaries present at the signing of the Guildpact.

data.name: Sunforger
Sword of the Paruns
data.oracle_text:
As long as equipped creature is tapped, tapped creatures you control get +2/+0.
As long as equipped creature is untapped, untapped creatures you control get +0/+2.
{3}: You may tap or untap equipped creature.
Equip {3}

data.name: Terrarion
data.oracle_text:
Terrarion enters the battlefield tapped.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Terrarion: Add two mana in any combination of colors to your mana pool.
When Terrarion is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

data.name: Transguild Courier
data.flavor_text: Reluctant to meet face to face, the leaders of the ten guilds prefer to do official business through a go-between immune to bribes and threats.

data.name: Voyager Staff
data.oracle_text: {2}, Sacrifice Voyager Staff: Exile target creature. Return the exiled card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
data.flavor_text: Voyager staffs are sought by those hoping to find an escape from the sprawling glut of Ravnica.

data.name: Walking Archive
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Walking Archive enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player draws a card for each +1/+1 counter on Walking Archive.
{2}{W}{U}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Walking Archive.
